plot: A young woman refuses her mother's request to make pie for a family funeral. Ultimately, she learns there is a whole lot more to her families' tradition than just pie.
title: Up There with Pie
plot_es: A young woman refuses her mother's request to make pie for a family funeral. Ultimately, she learns there is a whole lot more to her families' tradition than just pie.
plot_en: A young woman refuses her mother's request to make pie for a family funeral. Ultimately, she learns there is a whole lot more to her families' tradition than just pie.
